swot.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: someone who spends too much time studying and seems to have no other interests â€“ used to show disapproval
swot.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to study a lot in a short time, especially for an examination
swot.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a system for examining the way a company is run or the way someone works, in order to see what the good and bad features are
swot.translation[3].definitions[0].defin: strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, threats; a system for examining a business plan, the way a company is run etc, to see what the good and bad points are
swot.translation[3].definitions[0].examp: Before producing a business development plan, it may be helpful to carry out aSWOT analysis.
